"<br>About ARKS Ship Facilities<br>":
"This will explain about the ARKS Ship.

This is the ARKS ship Gate Area.

Here, you can accept quests at the Quest Counter, or level up your character's Skill levels at the Class Counter."

"Talk to the individual at the Quest Counter and select the Quest you wish to take.

There are two locations for the Quest Counter, but they are both the same."

"You can get to the Shop Area using the teleporter.

At the Shop Area, you can purchase weapons and armor units, or change your character's appearance at the Salon. Feel free to take a look around at everything."

"『ファンタシースターオンライン2』(以下『PSO2』)と
『ファンタシースターオンライン2 es』 (以下『PSO2es』)の
間で連動したキャラクターは以下の要素を連動します。

\u3000\u3000・『PSO2es』で入手した経験値の一部を加算
\u3000\u3000・所持メセタの共有
\u3000\u3000・所持FUNの共有
\u3000\u3000・アイテムパックの共有
\u3000\u3000\u3000武器/防具/コスチューム/パーツ\u3000など
\u3000\u3000・PSO2es倉庫の共有
\u3000\u3000・マグ育成状況の共有
\u3000\u3000・ペット育成状況の共有

詳しくは『PSO2es』のオンラインマニュアルをご確認ください。
以下のURLをクリック（決定）すると、
ブラウザーで開きます。
<&URL pso2es_players_linkage>"

"Some accessories available in PSO2 do not have counterparts in PSO2es.

Accessories with no counterparts will not be reflected on your character in PSO2es, even if you have them equipped in PSO2.

You can tell whether an accessory has a counterpart in PSO2es by whether they have an \"es\" icon on the accessory selection screen in the Salon.

When you have an accessory with the \"es\" icon equipped in PSO2, it will appear on your character in PSO2es."
